universum.studios.android.preference

Class PreferencesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager

  • public abstract class PreferencesManager
extends Object
    Manager that may be used to simplify management (storing + obtaining) of values presented within a SharedPreferences of an Android application.

    Primitive types

    The following methods can be used to store primitive types within shared preferences:
    • putInt(String, int) - getInt(String, int)
    • putFloat(String, float) - getInt(String, int)
    • putLong(String, long) - getLong(String, long)
    • putBoolean(String, boolean) - getBoolean(String, boolean)
    • putString(String, String) - getString(String, String)

    Arrays + Lists

    See ArrayPreference and ListPreference.

    Shared preferences

    The PreferencesManager is closely related with SharedPreference. You can use any implementation of SharedPreference class to represent any of your shared preference values. The following methods can be used to store/retrieve actual values of these preferences:
    • putPreference(SharedPreference, Object) - getPreference(SharedPreference)

    Sample implementation

     public class AppPreferences extends PreferencesManager {

      // Key for the first app launch preference.
      private static final String KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH = ".AppFirstLaunch";

      // Name of the shared preferences.
      private final String mPrefsName;

      // Creates a new instance of AppPreferences manager.
      public AppPreferences(Context context) {
          super(context);
          this.mPrefsName = getSharedPreferencesName();
      }

      // Stores a boolean flag into shared preferences indicating whether this is a first launch
      // of this app or not.
      public void saveIsAppFirstLaunch(boolean first) {
          putBoolean(mPrefsName + KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH, first);
      }

      // Returns a boolean flag from shared preferences indicating whether this is a first launch
      // of this app or not.
      public boolean isAppFirstLaunch() {
          return getBoolean(mPrefsName + KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH, true);
      }
 }
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

        protected PreferencesManager(@NonNull
                             Context context,
                             @NonNull
                             String preferencesName,
                             int mode)
        Creates a new instance of PreferencesManager with the given shared preferences name and preferences file creation mode.
        Parameters:
        context - Valid context to access shared preferences.
        preferencesName - Name for shared preferences file.
        mode - Shared preferences will be created in this mode.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultSharedPreferencesName

        @NonNull
public static String defaultSharedPreferencesName(@NonNull
                                                            Context context)
        Creates a default name for shared preferences (like the one created by PreferenceManager).
        Parameters:
        context - Context for which the name should be created.
        Returns:
        Default name for shared preferences.

      • getMode

        protected final int getMode()
        Returns the actual file creation mode for shared preferences.
        Returns:
        The shared preferences file creation mode. MODE_PRIVATE by default.
        See Also:
        Context, setMode(int)

      • setMode

        protected final void setMode(int mode)
        Sets the actual file creation mode for shared preferences. This mode is used whenever the instance of shared preferences is obtained to put/retrieve data to/from them.
        Parameters:
        mode - Preferences creation mode.
        See Also:
        getMode()

      • setSharedPreferencesName

        protected final void setSharedPreferencesName(@Nullable
                                              String name)
        Sets the actual name for shared preferences. This name is used whenever the instance of shared preferences is needed to put/retrieve data to/from it.

        Note, that you can set this to null to retrieve always default shared preferences.

        Parameters:
        name - The desired name for shared preferences.
        See Also:
        getSharedPreferencesName(), getSharedPreferences()

      • getSharedPreferencesName

        @Nullable
protected final String getSharedPreferencesName()
        Returns the actual name for shared preferences.
        Returns:
        Name used to retrieve shared preferences.
        See Also:
        setSharedPreferencesName(String)

      • getSharedPreferences

        @NonNull
public SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()
        Returns the instance of SharedPreferences depends on the current file creation mode and preferences name. If there is not currently provided name for shared preferences, the default one will be used.
        Returns:
        Instance of shared preferences.
        See Also:
        setMode(int), setSharedPreferencesName(String)

      • setCachingEnabled

        protected final void setCachingEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables/disables the caching SharedPreference's values.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable caching, false to disable.
        See Also:
        isCachingEnabled()

      • isCachingEnabled

        protected final boolean isCachingEnabled()

        Returns:
        True if caching is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:

      • putInt

        public final boolean putInt(@NonNull
                            String key,
                            int value)
        Saves the given int value into shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - The key under which will be the specified value mapped in the shared preferences.
        value - Value to save.
        Returns:
        True if saving succeeded, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getInt(String, int), contains(String), remove(String)

      • getInt

        public final int getInt(@NonNull
                        String key,
                        int defValue)
        Returns the int value mapped in the shared preferences under the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key under which is the requested value mapped in the shared preferences.
        defValue - Default value to return if there is no mapping for the specified key yet.
        Returns:
        int value obtained from the shared preferences or defValue if there is no mapping for the given key.
        See Also:
        putInt(String, int)

        Returns:

      • remove

        public final boolean remove(@NonNull
                            String key)
        Removes current value of a preference with the specified key from the shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the desired preference of which value (entry) should be removed.
        Returns:
        True if current value of shared preference has been removed, false if some error occurred.
        See Also:
        contains(String)

      • putPreference

        public final <Type> boolean putPreference(@NonNull
                                          SharedPreference<Type> preference,
                                          @Nullable
                                          Type value)
        Saves the given value using the specified preference into shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        preference - Preference of which value should be saved.
        value - The value of preference to save into shared preferences.
        Returns:
        True if save operation succeeded, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getPreference(SharedPreference), containsPreference(SharedPreference), removePreference(SharedPreference)

      • getPreference

        public final <Type> Type getPreference(@NonNull
                                       SharedPreference<Type> preference)
        Obtains the value of the given preference from shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        preference - Preference of which value should be obtained.
        Returns:
        Value of the given shared preference.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object)

      • containsPreference

        public final boolean containsPreference(@NonNull
                                        SharedPreference preference)
        Checks whether value of the given preference is contained within the shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        preference - The desired preference of which value to check.
        Returns:
        True if some value for the specified preference is stored, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object), getPreference(SharedPreference), removePreference(SharedPreference)

      • removePreference

        public final boolean removePreference(@NonNull
                                      SharedPreference preference)
        Removes current value of the given preference from the shared preferences.
        Parameters:
        preference - The desired preference of which value (entry) should be removed.
        Returns:
        True if current value of shared preference has been removed, false if some error occurred.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object), getPreference(SharedPreference), containsPreference(SharedPreference)
